main event: Several witnesses observed a bright, glowing object hovering over Mexico City at around 8:20 PM on November 12, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as orange-red and appeared to be round or oval in shape., The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes before the object faded from view., The case was investigated by the Mexican Air Force and forwarded to the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book., The object was reported to be around 40-50 feet in diameter and moved silently before disappearing., Four Mexican Air Force pilots also photographed a disc-shaped object that accelerated at a speed of 1,800 mph.
sighted object: a bright, glowing, round or oval object
